Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The variable is always present and is the entry point for all information. It exposes an object of type  org.opencms.jsp.util.CmsJspStandardContextBean.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Return the title of the current page. Works also for detail pages.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns true iff the edit mode is enabled. Note that edit mode can also be disabled offline, e.g., when previewing pages.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the current locale as java.util.Locale. Short for cms.requestContext.locale.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the current user's configured workplace locale.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns true, iff a container page element is re-rendered with out a page reload (happens when moving or editing elements). Without a page reload, JavaScript may be corrupted - so you may need to react.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Produces a specific HTML comment, that will cause a page reload when the formatted content is re-rendered.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the value of the element setting "name". You can also write cms.element.settings.name. See CmsJspStandardContextBean.CmsContainerElementWrapper to check for more information available via cms.element.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content:
Returns the type of currently rendered container, e.g., to influence the formatter's behavior according to the type.

 See CmsContainerBean to check for other information available via cms.container.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the current detail content as CmsResource, or null if no detail content is requested. You can get more information on detail contents via cms. Look up the methods of the CmsJspStandardContextBean.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns true, iff a detail page is requested.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns true, iff a detail page is configured for the currently rendered container page element.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the content encoding to be used in HTTP response.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the site-relative OpenCms VFS URI of the requested resource.
